DOF: P10.1B cash aid given to 1.26M workers under SBWS program tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737394 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737394/dof-p10-1b-cash-aid-given-to-1-26m-workers-under-sbws-program/story/ A total of P10.1 billion worth of cash grants have been credited to 1.26 million workers so far under the government s Small Business Wage Subsidy (SBWS) program, the Department of Finance (DOF) said Friday. Fri, 08 May 2020 14:21:42 +0800
Rep. Defensor on NTC order vs. ABS-CBN: Perjury po ito tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737392 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737392/rep-defensor-on-ntc-order-vs-abs-cbn-perjury-po-ito/story/ A party-list lawmaker on Friday said National Telecommunications Commission (NTC) officials are liable to criminal charges for issuing cease and desist order on ABS-CBN, which is allegedly contrary to the commitment the commission made to Congress in March. Fri, 08 May 2020 14:19:32 +0800
Pacquiao s new normal bill imposes P5k to P50k fines for quarantine violations tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737391 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737391/pacquiao-s-new-normal-bill-imposes-p5k-to-p50k-fines-for-quarantine-violations/story/ Further, the bill provides that during the course of the COVID-19 pandemic or should similar outbreaks occur, "every individual residing in areas declared to be under enforced community quarantine or lockdown by the national government is restricted from leaving his or her place of residence." Fri, 08 May 2020 13:58:35 +0800
Guimaras remains free from COVID-19 -- official tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737388 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/737388/guimaras-remains-free-from-covid-19-official/story/ "Anticipation is very important dahil kung ma-a-anticipate mo kung ano 'yung magiging kalaban mo, you could make some sort of paunang steps so kung ikumpara natin 'yung parasitic infection, bacterial, at saka viral infection, 'yung viral infection has the capacity to be explosive," Governor Samuel Gumarin said at the Laging Handa press briefing on Friday. Fri, 08 May 2020 13:17:44 +0800
Pilipinas, malapit na nga ba sa 'flattening' ng COVID-19 curve? tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737385 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737385/pilipinas-malapit-na-nga-ba-sa-flattening-ng-covid-19-curve/story/ Inilahad ni Presidential Spokesperson Harry Roque kamakailan lamang na mayroon nang general trend ang Pilipinas ng "flattening of the COVID-19 curve." Ngunit ayon sa datos ng isang international organization, "need to take action" pa rin ang bansa dahil patuloy pa rin ang pagtaas ng mga kaso. Fri, 08 May 2020 12:49:50 +0800
Philippines COVID-19 testing capacity now at 12,000 -Dizon tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737386 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737386/philippines-covid-19-testing-capacity-now-at-12-000-dizon/story/ The Philippines can now conduct 12,000 tests for COVID-19 a day as it ramps up its testing capacity in order to immediately isolate and treat patients. Fri, 08 May 2020 12:40:02 +0800
Coronavirus has caused 'tsunami' of hate, xenophobia --UN chief tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737383 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737383/coronavirus-has-caused-tsunami-of-hate-xenophobia-un-chief/story/ UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres called Friday for an "all-out effort" to end the "tsunami of hate and xenophobia" caused by the novel coronavirus pandemic, without naming specific countries. Fri, 08 May 2020 12:23:31 +0800
Barangay chair, social welfare officer face complaints for alleged cash aid distribution irregularities in Neg Occ tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737382 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/737382/barangay-chair-social-welfare-officer-face-complaints-for-alleged-anomaly-in-sap-aid-distribution-in-negros/story/ Complaints were filed against a barangay chairperson and a municipal social welfare and development officer in Negros Occidental for alleged irregularities in the distribution of the cash aid from the Social Amelioration Program (SAP). Fri, 08 May 2020 12:17:42 +0800
Gatchalian wants probe on how Philippine education would cope with COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737381 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737381/gatchalian-wants-probe-on-how-philippine-education-would-cope-with-covid-19/story/ "Hindi lamang natin sisikaping makabangon ang ating sistema ng edukasyon mula sa naging epekto ng COVID-19, kailangan nating patatagin ang kakayahan ng ating mga paaralan na ipagpatuloy ang pagbibigay ng dekalidad na edukasyon sa panahon ng mga krisis at sakuna," Senator Sherwin Gatchalian said in a statement. Fri, 08 May 2020 12:11:15 +0800
CHED says DBM agreed not to bar release of fund for free tuition, student loans tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737380 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737380/ched-says-dbm-agreed-not-to-bar-release-of-fund-for-free-tuition-student-loans/story/ College students who are depending on free tuition and miscellaneous fees under the Universal Access to Quality Tertiary Education Act should not worry of budget cuts amid the COVID-19 pandemic, the Commission on Higher Education (CHED) said Friday. Raffle of newly-filed cases in ECQ areas resumes through videoconferencing tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737373 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737373/raffle-of-newly-filed-cases-in-ecq-areas-resumes-through-videoconferencing/story/ The raffle of newly-filed cases in courts located in areas under enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) will resume through videoconferencing after being suspended last month, the Office of the Court Administrator (OCA) said Friday. Teachers' group party-list: Grades should not include attendance, recitation under new normal setup tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737371 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737371/teachers-group-party-list-grades-should-not-include-attendance-recitation-under-new-normal-amid-covid-19-thre/story/ The grading system for students should not give weight to attendance and recitation under a new normal classroom setup amid the COVID-19 pandemic where physical distancing is required, a lawmaker said Friday.
